text: Pechane theke ya'oya lokera allahara rasula theke bicchinna haye base thakate pere ananda labha kareche; ara jana o malera dbara allahara rahe jehada karate apachanda kareche ebam baleche, e'i garamera madhye abhiyane bera hayo na. Bale da'o, uttape jahannamera aguna pracandatama. Yadi tadera bibecana sakti thakata.
